kb_cs_algorithms.name: Advanced Algorithms and Data Structures
kb_cs_algorithms.description: Covers advanced algorithm design, complexity analysis, dynamic programming, graph algorithms, etc.

kb_cs_systems.name: Computer Systems Principles and Architecture
kb_cs_systems.description: Computer organization, OS kernels, distributed system design, etc.

kb_cs_ai.name: Frontier AI Technologies
kb_cs_ai.description: Machine learning, deep learning, NLP, computer vision, etc.

kb_cs_security.name: Network Security and Cryptography

kb_cs_database.name: Advanced Database Systems
kb_cs_database.description: Database kernel principles, distributed databases, NoSQL
